content:
TargetReplicaSelector.RandomSecondaryReplica Field

Definition

Namespace:
Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.Communication.Client
Assembly:
Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.dll

In this Article

For stateful service partitions, this indicates that communication channel can be established for to any secondary replica chosen in random. This is not valid for stateless service partitions

RandomSecondaryReplica
Returns
TargetReplicaSelector

To be added.
